meanings.definition: The action of marrying a person of a superior caste or class.
meanings.sent1: Her hypergamies led her to marry into a wealthy family.
meanings.sent2: In some cultures, hypergamies is a common way to improve social status.
meanings.sent3: She joked that her hypergamies were her ticket to a life of luxury.
meanings.sent4: His hypergamies were like climbing a ladder to a higher social class.
meanings.sent5: The concept of hypergamies can be seen in many fairy tales where a princess marries a prince.

meanings.definition: The practice of seeking a spouse of higher socioeconomic status.
meanings.sent1: Their hypergamies involved looking for partners with more money.
meanings.sent2: Hypergamies can sometimes lead to strained relationships due to financial differences.
meanings.sent3: He teased his friend about her hypergamies, saying she was a gold digger.
meanings.sent4: In the world of hypergamies, love sometimes takes a back seat to wealth.
meanings.sent5: The movie portrayed hypergamies as a way for characters to move up the social ladder.
